item.title: About me
item.description:
I’m currently a second-year undergraduate student at the School of EECS, Peking University, advised by Prof. Zemin Zhang. I’m interested in bioinformatics and AI for science.

Education

  • 2025.9 - now Undergraduate in Information and Computing Science | School of EECS, Peking University, China.
  • 2024.9 - 2025.7 Undergraduate in Bioinformatics | School of Life Science, Peking University, China.
  • 2018.9 - 2024.6 Student | The Experimental High School Attached to Beijing Normal University, China.

Publications

(Empty)
